channel.title: My new Website Header Rate / Hate
channel.description:
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2akljfc.png[/img]
Will be using on my new site rate / hate
Thanks

item.title: My new Website Header Rate / Hate
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Alone, it looks… not bad, but simple. But I looked at the site in your sig and it goes very well together. Nice job

item.source: My new Website Header Rate / Hate

item.title: My new Website Header Rate / Hate
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

[quote=“WHATBLOOD, post:6, topic:445741”][quote author=Mr…x… link=topic=548576.msg4021502#msg4021502 date=1340050298]

I don’t know if it’s suppose to be, but the A looks very pixelated. Other then that it’s good.

Ye its the way it goes with the site

Visit my Info below to view a live and tell me what you think

To be honest I didn’t expect to see that. It’s actually very nice.
The LET’S PLAY blends in very well with the surrounding colour’s/effects!
Only one suggestion:
Make the top navbar rollover text glow, instead of showing a block. Make them glow a nice yellow/gold.
[hr]
Also, is that a custom template? Or did you donwload it and install?
[/quote]

Its a premium template, i paid for The Pro version fromtemplatemonster.com

Explain in more detail what you meen by your statement above?

Interested now explain[/quote]
This is what your forum button looks like, without rollover:

This is what it looks like with rollover:

This is what I’m suggesting as a rollover:

Obviously better then that. I made that in like 10 seconds. Lol, but you get what I mean?

BTW is that your server?

Read full topic
